column_description: The unique identifier of the refund object.
Timestamp of when a record was last synced.
Boolean identifiying whether the record was deleted in the source.
The accounting code associated with the refund.
The amount of the refund.
The date and time when the refund was cancelled.
A comment about the refund.
The id of the user who created the refund.
The date and time when the refund was created.
The type of the refund method.
The id of the payment method used for the refund.
The date when the refund was processed.
The refund number associated with the refund.
The date and time when the refund transaction was processed.
The date and time when the refund was settled.
The type of the refund source.
The status of the refund.
The date and time when the refund was submitted.
A flag that indicates whether the refund was transferred to the accounting system.
The type of the refund.
The id of the user who last updated the refund.
The date and time when the refund was last updated.
